page.title: 03SHIRGARTON FARM,KIPPEN.
page.content: {Shirgarton farm}is situated in{Kippen, 17 kilometers west of the main market town of{Stirling.}The farm lies above the flat{carse_land}where the{River {Forth}meanders from the west to the east of the county.{Mr. John More,}the tenant farmer,has lived and worked at Shirgarton for 30 years.The farm is quite small,(50 hectares) and consists mainly of sloping ground. The{soil}is of a{clay_type}and{crops}grown include :_hay,barley,turnips and potatoes. {Livestock}:_60 cows_46 Aberdeen Angus, 14 cross-cows and an Aberdeen Angus bull,a small flock of 40 Blackface and cross-sheep.All the lambs are sold. {Machinery}:-2 tractors & trailers, manure & fertiliser spreaders,a turnip & potato planter,a turnip harvester and shares the following with Mr.More of{The Mains of Boquhan}:-combine harvester,mechanical-digger and baler.
